concurrent.label: Concurrent search limit
concurrent.description: The number of simultaneous connections that can be made to the data source.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

search_timeout.label: Query Search Timeout Limit
search_timeout.description: The limit on how long the query will run, in minutes, on the data source.

result_limit.label: Result size limit
result_limit.description: The maximum number of entries or objects that are returned by search query.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

batch_size.label: Result length for datasource request
batch_size.description: The maximum results retrive in single API request to the datasource. This is not results limit. This value is mainly used for pagination.

time_range.label: Query time range
time_range.description: Time range for the search, in minutes, represented as last x minutes.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

timeout.label: Query response timeout limit
timeout.description: The limit on how long to wait for the data source response, in seconds. Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

dialects.label: Dialect
dialects.description: The dialect to use if the data source needs to search multiple schema or database tables.

validate_pattern.label: STIX pattern validator
validate_pattern.description: Validate STIX patterns that needs to be translated into native data source query

mapping.label: Custom mapping
mapping.description: Custom stix mapping if default mapping needs to be replaced

host.label: Management IP address or hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or hostname of the data source

port.label: Host port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the hostname or IP address

namespace.label: The UUID Namespace to generate unique
namespace.description: Supply a UUID to generate deterministic UUIDs for the resulting STIX bundle

rateLimit.label: Rate Limit
rateLimit.description: The number of queries allowed by ReversingLabs

rateUnit.label: Rate Unit
rateUnit.description: The rate unit for rate limit in [seconds, minutes, days, months, years ...]

cacheDuration.label: Cache Duration
cacheDuration.description: How long should we cache the results of the STIX Bundle execution?

unit.label: Rate Unit
unit.description: The unit for cache in [seconds, minutes, days, months, years ...]

ip.label: IP Address
ip.description: Whether IP Address lookup queries are supported by Reversing Labs based on the User's API Provisioning

domain.label: Domain
domain.description: Whether Domain queries are supported by Reversing Labs based on the User's API Provisioning

url.label: URL
url.description: Whether Domain queries are supported by Reversing Labs based on the User's API Provisioning

hash.label: Hash
hash.description: Whether Hash queries are supported by Reversing Labs based on the User's API Provisioning
